pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Apache SedonaThis library is the Python wrapper for Apache Sedona.Apache Sedona is a cluster computing system for processing large-scale spatial data. Apache Sedona extends Apache Spark / SparkSQL with a set of out-of-the-box Spatial Resilient Distributed Datasets (SRDDs)/ SpatialSQL that efficiently load, process, and analyze large-scale spatial data across machines.Please visit the official Apache Sedona website:https://sedona.apache.org/
